alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula Inland; Geauga; Mahoning; Portage; Stark; Trumbull (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 9:43PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Portage, Trumbull, Mahoning, eastern Geauga, northeastern Stark and southern Ashtabula Counties through 1115 PM EDT... At 942 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northwest of Orwell to Garrettsville to Hartville. Multiple points along the line have exhibited weak rotation. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Canton, Youngstown, Warren, Sharon, Salem, Ravenna, Columbiana, Boardman, Alliance, Niles, North Canton, Louisville, Campbell, Hubbard, Canfield, Cortland, Newton Falls, Sebring, Lordstown and Hartville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
